content: As mentioned in Kandi's Q1 '22 10-Q, made public on May 22, we saw the following, "On February 22, 2022, the Seattle Sports and Coleman Powersports signed an MOU regarding the sale of 5,000 Kandi carts -- golf carts, value of $29 million, also in the same SEC filing a few days later, another MOU was signed on March 3 with a group of more than 20 dealers, and that was put down to be valued about $39 million also for another 5,000 units.
